title: Artifact System - Code & Document Extraction
description: Detects and extracts deliverables (code, documents, sales materials) from LLM responses. Creates downloadable artifacts that users can copy or save.
author: DeepFish Core Team

usage.when_to_use: Automatically used when bot generates code or documents
examples: Bot creates React component → Artifact created automatically
Bot writes sales pitch → Artifact created automatically
Bot generates config file → Artifact created automatically

botId.description: ID of bot that created response

returns.items: Artifact objects with type, language, filename, content

artifact_types: code - Code files (JS, TS, Python, etc.)
notes: Critical for v1.0. Without this, users can't extract deliverables from bot responses.
